remarks: Elimination of two existential quantifiers, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Jun-2006.)
statement:
ceqsex2.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
ceqsex2.2 $e |- F/ y ch $.
ceqsex2.3 $e |- A e. _V $.
ceqsex2.4 $e |- B e. _V $.
ceqsex2.5 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsex2.6 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ceqsex2 $p |- ( E. x E. y ( x = A /\ y = B /\ ph ) <-> ch ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
